text: The discography of Ella Henderson, an English singer and songwriter. Her debut studio album, Chapter One, was released in October 2014. The album peaked at number one on the UK Singles Chart. The album includes the singles "Ghost", "Glow", "Yours" and "Mirror Man". Her debut extended play, Glorious, was released in November 2019. The EP includes the singles "Glorious", "Young" and "Friends". ==Studio albums== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" style="width:12em;"| Title !
